headers.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self' https://*.zoom.us; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://*.zoom.us https://appssdk.zoom.us; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://*.zoom.us; img-src 'self' data: https: blob:; media-src 'self' https://*.zoom.us; connect-src 'self' https://*.zoom.us wss://*.zoom.us https://api.wecreateproblems.com; frame-src 'self' https://*.zoom.us; object-src 'none'; upgrade-insecure-requests;
